runs.comm: yorker, beautifully bowled, at 149 kmph, almost Taitean, dug out towards cover
short of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and works it behind square for a single
Warner's off the mark in style, bangs it short and he's upto it, rocking back to pulling over deep square leg for six, landed on the ropes
short again but outside off, a touch too wide, given
another one, took his hands off after pulling it behind square, had enough on it to take it past the ropes behind fine leg, came on to him a little too quickly but he got into position early
the punishment continues, short of a good length on the off, stays his ground and slaps it along the ground past mid-off for a boundary

Poor Roach, he's bleeding runs here, a short delivery again, bowling to Warner's strength, and repeats what he did earlier in the over albeit far more convincingly this time, getting off the middle and smacking it over deep midwicket for a flat six
sensible stuff, short outside off, chopped towards third man for a single
gently played, short of a good length on the off, worked away towards midwicket for a single
short and wide, cracked from the crease towards deep cover for a single
almost had him with a slower one there, Warner didn't pick it, the offcutter and he was into his shot too early, just missed the leg stump
bowled it short outside leg stump, tried to pull it behind square, couldn't get his bat to it, missed and the umpire calls it a wide, a touch harsh
he wants to finish this off early, slower one and he wasn't deceived this time, landed on a length on the off stump, right in the slot and he struck it cleanly over long-on for a big one
carnage, short and wide makes room and slaps it with utter contempt wide of mid-off for a boundary, Sammy's not spared either
short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot to cover
short, smacked away towards deep square leg for a single
wide, short, too wide, lots of open spaces in the leg side and he slips it wide of off, given
Smith's turn now, slower one bowled short outside off, a long hop, pulled away for the umpteenth time into the stands, well taken in the crowd
bowled it on a length this time, on the off, driven towards mid-on for a single
pushed back hard back to the bowler, Watson playing the patient hand here
angling in towards middle, played gently in the direction of midwicket, no run taken
flighted on middle and leg, comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler
short on the off, moves back, waits for it to turn away and swats it over extra cover for a boundary
pushed through quick, pushed back to the bowler
similar to the boundary earlier in the over except that he got more elevation this time, short, and he gave it the deserved treatment
in the blockhole on leg stump, dug out back to the bowler, nicely bowled
and again, pitching it outside leg, he's made room to play it into the off side, gets an inside edge onto his pads
short of a length on the off, punched off the back foot to extra cover
short again, crashed off the back foot but straight to extra cover
terrible delivery, Watson gets into the act now, full toss on the off and he swings it between midwicket and mid-on for a boundary
they're making short work of this West Indian total, short again, long hop, plenty of time to move back and pull it over midwicket for another four
the best of the three, quicker through the air, bowled full on the off and he lofted it through the line and timed it so exquisitely that it had enough on it to clear long-off
he's taken a bit of time to open up but better late than never, they're cruising towards their target here, short outside off, moves back and cracks it between cover and point
flighted on the off, driven to mid-off
Warner's broken his own record, this is now the second-fastest fifty in T20 cricket, lofted over cover and point for a boundary
blockhole again, dug out into the off side

appeal for a stumping, Warner had prepared himself for a reverse-pull there, was bowled short outside leg stump but he couldn't connect, missed, and Ramdin took off the bails but replays showed he had just dragged his foot back
full toss on the off, drilled towards mid-off, no single on offer there
there's no stopping him here, flatter but lands on a length on middle, Warner steps forward and sends it back over the bowler's head onto the sightscreen with one clean swing of the bat
Pollard isn't spared either, bowls a slower one right in the slot outside off and Watson thumps it over wide long-on for another six
pushed into the off side for a single
slower one and Warner didn't quite pick that, bowled at 109 kmph, swung too early and missed
almost done in by a slower one again, was aiming at the deep square-leg boundary, but played it too early and was struck on the back leg
full outside off, steered towards deep cover for a single
tries to force it through the off side, ends up getting an inside edge behind square
Nikita comes back for some more punishment, tossed it up outside off, bent low and slog-swept it miles into the stands over deep midwicket
pushed it into the leg side off the front foot
tossed up outside off, strikes it cleanly but doesn't get the desired distance, hits it flat, lands in front of long-off but he comes back for the second
Miller fires it on leg stump, it's fullish, an invitation for Warner to go downtown, gets plenty of elevation there but not enough on it to clear Pollard at long-on
bowled full outside off, driven hard, mifielded by Gayle at extra cover, two more to the score, they go past three-figures
flighted on middle, cracked through midwicket, wide of long-on for a couple more
short outside off, Haddin swats it down to long-on for a single
short and wide, Watson gets back and crunches that to deep cover for a single
short of a good length on the off, bowling from behind the stumps, defended to point
shortish outside off, guided down to third man for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, opens the face to guide it down to backward point
creamed through the covers into the deep for a single
full toss goes unspared, Watson swings it away over deep square leg for a massive six
slapped off the back foot wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
Miller's been horrendous today, another full toss on the waist and Watson has no trouble dispatching it over deep square leg again, another one for the crowd
cut away towards deep point for a couple to reach his half-century, no let up after Warner's departure
Haddin gets into the act, tossed up on the off, drills it hard past the bowler to beat long-off to the boundary
bowled it short on the off, pulled away through square leg in the deep for a couple
slower one bowled short outside off, punched back to the bowler
bowled on a length on middle, smacked through the line towards long-on for a couple of runs
slower one bowled short outside off, swats it hard past the bowler to beat long-on to the ropes
bowls it on a good length on middle, gets under and it thumps it towards long-on for a single, gets to him on the bounce
slower one bowled short outside off, tries to tickle it to third man, can't connect
turns it away through square leg for a single, scores are level
tries to loft it over the bowler's head, it's tossed up, gets a leading edge and it lands safe in palms of Morton at extra cover
pushes it back to the bowler
comes down the track and  clips it over square leg to get it to the ropes and seal an unbeaten summer for Australia
